faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Bunayat.

questions.question: How quickly can I start generating invoices?
questions.answer: Most landlords issue their first Arabic invoice within 30 minutes. We import your Excel tenant list, verify formatting, and you can generate compliant invoices the same day.

questions.question: Do tenants need to download an app?
questions.answer: No. Tenants receive SMS and email notifications with invoice details. They confirm payment via bank transfer ‚Äî the same method they already use for utilities ‚Äî and you track confirmations directly in Bunayat.

questions.question: Is Arabic language support complete?
questions.answer: Yes. Every invoice, contract, and official document is generated in proper Arabic formatting that fully meets municipality standards. Our Omani customers submit them for audits without edits.

questions.question: How does payment tracking work?
questions.answer: Tenants pay via bank transfer and confirm by SMS or email. Payments are marked as received in Bunayat, which automatically stops reminder messages. Payment gateway integration is available in the Enterprise plan.

questions.question: Can I export data for my accountant?
questions.answer: Yes. Export everything into Excel formatted to Omani accounting standards. Invoices, payment confirmations, tenant records ‚Äî your accountant gets familiar files without learning new software.

questions.question: What type of support do you provide?
questions.answer: Support in both Arabic and English via email, chat, and phone. Our local team understands Omani regulations and municipal compliance requirements.

questions.question: Is my data secure and compliant with Omani law?
questions.answer: Bunayat uses enterprise-grade encryption and complies fully with Oman's data protection regulations and municipal audit standards.

questions.question: Can I change my plan later?
questions.answer: Yes. You can upgrade or downgrade anytime, with changes effective immediately. No long-term contracts required.
